name: The Rivington Desk
description: Distinctive yet elegant, the Rivington Desk has been designed with the extraordinary CEO in mind. The rich Sycamore Black finish top is contrasted with the brushed brass trim and vegan leather insert on top. The almond shaped pedestals make this a unique, executive desk destined to be the focal point of your home office, while the sliding drawers conceal fully extending soft closed runners and make your desk an ideal place to store important documents and computer accessories.
